long.am,ar,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
âœ¨âœ¨âœ¨ Whatâ€™s New
Say hello to the OceanHero Chatbot! Powered by renewable energy, itâ€™s here to answer your questions, guide your journey, and share tips to make your impact even bigger.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ğŸ¤ Over 100,000 People Are Already Making a Difference!
Together, weâ€™ve removed 60 million plastic bottles from the ocean. But with plastic entering our waters every second, thereâ€™s no time to waste. Join now to make a real impact.


â­ï¸ Tiny Actions, Big Change
The ocean gives us so much: over half the oxygen we breathe and the stability of our climate. With OceanHero, you can give back without changing your daily routine! 

On average, every five searches or 17 new tabs = 1 plastic bottle removed.
Itâ€™s easy. Itâ€™s free. And it works. Every search directly supports real cleanups that remove harmful plastic from the ocean and protect marine life.


ğŸ‹ Our Mission
The ocean isnâ€™t just waterâ€”itâ€™s life. By removing plastic waste, weâ€™re not just saving turtles, dolphins, and coral reefs; weâ€™re ensuring a sustainable future for our planet. Your actions today help shape a cleaner tomorrow.


ğŸ‘¥ Our Partners
We donâ€™t do this alone. OceanHero collaborates with amazing organizations like Plastic Bank and World Free Oceans to guarantee that every bottle collected creates a real, lasting impact. Together, weâ€™re creating waves of change.


ğŸŒŠ Your All-in-One Productivity Hub and Chill Zone
When you add OceanHero to your browser, youâ€™re not just helping save the planet, youâ€™re unlocking a personalized space that blends productivity, relaxation, and purpose. Hereâ€™s whatâ€™s waiting for you:
ğŸŒŸ A stunning new tab homepage with customizable HD and video backgrounds to inspire your day.
âš¡ A renewable-energy-powered chatbot ready to answer questions, guide you, and share ocean-saving tips.
ğŸ“ˆ A live counter to track how many plastic bottles youâ€™ve helped remove, keeping you motivated to make a difference.
ğŸŒ™ Light and dark modes to create a comfortable, distraction-free browsing experience.
ğŸ® Fun mini-games and social features for when you need a quick break or want to connect with friends.
ğŸ” A smart search box that keeps you productive while effortlessly supporting real-world cleanups.

With OceanHero, every tab becomes an opportunity to stay focused, unwind, and contribute to a cleaner, healthier planetâ€”all in one place.


ğŸ”’ Your Privacy, Always Protected
We value your trust. All searches are SSL encrypted, and we only request the permissions necessary to give you the best experience:

ğŸŒ To display your most visited sites.
ğŸ›‘ To highlight polluting companies as you browse.
âš™ï¸ To customize your settings for ultimate control.
Learn more in our Privacy Policy.
long.bg,cs,fi,fr,hu,it,nl,no,pl,sv:
This extension sets your search engine to OceanHero. With every search, you will support solving the problem of plastic pollution of the oceans.

â˜… How it works â˜…

OceanHero is a search engine like any other. The major difference is that with every search, you help save the oceans from plastic pollution. For every five searches you do, we collect one ocean-bound plastic bottle.

Install our extension and start changing the world now! Because our oceans matter...

â˜… Your privacy is important to us â˜…

Your searches are always SSL-encrypted. OceanHero doesn't save your searches or track the websites you visit. Also, we never sell your data to advertisers or other third parties.

â˜… Learn more about OceanHero â˜…

To learn more about OceanHero, please visit our website at https://oceanhero.today

â˜… Permissions â˜…

Like any other extension OceanHero needs certain permissions to function properly:

"Read and change data on all OceanHero.today sites" and "Communicate with cooperating websites": These permissions are needed to communicate with our web services.
"Replace the page that you see when opening a new tab": We will update your new tab page so that you can easily search with OceanHero every time you open a new tab.
"Read a list of your most frequented websites": The extension needs this permission to display your most frequently visited sites on the new tab page.
"Change your search settings to OceanHero.today": We will use this permission to update your default search to OceanHero
